title: ‘Pogačar’s Strength is His Weak Point:’ Could UAE’s Aggressive Tactics Backfire at Tour de France?
content:
Momentum shift at the Tour de France puts renewed focus on Pogačar's unrelenting attacks: 'How many bullets does Tadej have left?'

Read the full article at ‘Pogačar’s Strength is His Weak Point:’ Could UAE’s Aggressive Tactics Backfire at Tour de France? on Velo.
author: ahood
